page.title: 11CLUBS IN MADDERTY
page.content: There is a branch of the Scottish Women's Rural Institute which meets on the second Wednesday of the month from October to May in the Village Hall. A recently formed club is the Young Women's Group which meets on the first Tuesday of the month also in the village hall. The Madderty Women's Guild associated with the Abbey Church, meets on the third Monday of the month from October to March. Up till three years ago a Youth Club used to meet weekly in the village hall but this was stopped due to the lack of teenagers in the area.
